# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="8ed94-102">如何在 Outlook.com 設定中尋找選項</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8ed94-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8ed94-103">在頁面頂端，選取齒輪圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8ed94-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8ed94-104">以開啟設定。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8ed94-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8ed94-105">在設定窗格的底部，選取 [[**流覽所有 Outlook 設定**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage)]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8ed94-105">At the bottom of the Settings pane, select [**View all Outlook settings**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8ed94-106">這會顯示您的一般、電子郵件、行事曆及（如果適用）高級設定和選項。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8ed94-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
